content: When you've beaten Lang-Baw-Baw, fly up again and look to the opposite side of the water. You'll see red trees in the distance, but it's the area on the right you'll want to go to first.
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "Poison_Chiefs.md", within the section "Poison Chiefs" and the sub-section "How to Find Poison Chief 2". The content is presented below:

When you've beaten Lang-Baw-Baw, fly up again and look to the opposite side of the water. You'll see red trees in the distance, but it's the area on the right you'll want to go to first.
